module.name: Call Recording
module.description: Provides much of the call recording functionality.
module.changelog: *12.0.1.4* #8393 Remove legacy code *12.0.1.3* #8482 Fix potential for unconfigured datestamp *12.0.1.2* #8298 *12.0.1.1* Handle old 'delayed' entry *12.0.1* Significant changes to the way Call Recordings work. See wiki. *2.11.0.7* #7315 *2.11.0.6* Generate License file *2.11.0.5* Use abstracted function for last insert id *2.11.0.4* #6914, PBXAC-13 *2.11.0.3* #6766 (fixes regression from #6708) *2.11.0.2* #6708 *2.11.0.1* #6051 *2.11.0.0* #5909 outbound route recording settings *2.10.0.2* add mgr script for one-touch-record *2.10.0.1* #5478 *2.10.0.0* New Module
